macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Gains 0.6% as Markets Hold Steady Before Year-End Data
items.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.6% to close at 6,878.49, with six of eleven broad market sectors finishing in positive territory. Markets are holding gains ahead of the last major economic data releases of 2025.

items.title: Treasury Yields Decline as Stocks Maintain Momentum
items.summary: The yield on 10-year Treasuries fell two basis points to 4.15% as equity markets continued to hold gains heading into the final trading days of the year.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: OCC Gives US Banks Go-Ahead on Riskless Crypto Transfers
items.summary: The Office of the Comptroller of the Currency has approved US banks to conduct riskless cryptocurrency transfers, marking a significant regulatory milestone for institutional crypto adoption.

items.title: FDIC Issues Proposed Rule on GENIUS Act Implementation
items.summary: The FDIC approved a notice of proposed rulemaking on December 16 to implement the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for U.S. Stablecoins Act, providing clarity to state banks on stablecoin issuance regulations.

items.title: Bitcoin Down 5.25% Year-to-Date, Ethereum Falls 9.80%
items.summary: Bitcoin has declined to $88,480 and Ethereum to $3,005, reversing strong gains from earlier in 2025 following an October market downturn. Technical analysis suggests further weakness ahead.

items.title: Bitcoin Down 22% in Q4, Heading for Worst Year Since 2018
items.summary: Bitcoin has declined more than 22% in the fourth quarter, putting 2025 on track to be one of the weakest year-end periods outside of major bear markets.

items.title: Cardano-Based NIGHT Token Crashes; Privacy Coins Also Decline
items.summary: The Cardano-based NIGHT token experienced a significant crash, with privacy-focused cryptocurrencies ZEC and XMR also dropping.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: IAES Journals Release December 2025 Issues with 294 AI and Engineering Articles
items.summary: Multiple IAES journals published their year-end December 2025 issues featuring comprehensive coverage of artificial intelligence, machine learning, and engineering topics. The IAES International Journal of Artificial Intelligence alone published 83 articles on machine learning, deep learning, and cutting-edge algorithms, while the International Journal of Electrical and Computer Engineering released 87 articles focusing on AI, intelligent control systems, and energy optimization.

items.title: NeurIPS 2025 Study Reveals Breakthrough in Multi-Agent AI Communication
items.summary: A new study from MBZUAI presented at NeurIPS 2025 demonstrates that accessing agents' internal structures significantly improves multi-agent decision-making, enabling more effective communication between AI systems without relying on traditional word-based interaction.

items.title: Model Context Protocol Emerges as Key Technology for Enterprise AI ROI in 2026
items.summary: Industry analysis indicates that Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers, which connect large language models to real-time data sources and external tools, will be critical for delivering AI return on investment in 2026. Organizations are reporting 300-400% productivity gains when building agentic systems with MCP support.

items.title: Cybersecurity Industry Addresses AI-Related Threats and Solutions
items.summary: As machine learning models continue to evolve, cybersecurity defenses are being updated to address new threats. Industry partnerships, including collaborations between major security firms, are being formed to secure the next generation of AI systems.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Vince Zampella, 'Call of Duty' Pioneer, Dies at 55
items.summary: Vince Zampella, a key creator behind the best-selling 'Call of Duty' video game series, has died at age 55. Electronic Arts confirmed the news.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Apple Releases iOS 18.4 and macOS 15.4 Betas to Developers
items.summary: Apple has made beta versions of iOS 18.4, macOS 15.4, and other platforms available to developers. This update comes alongside new Australian regulations requiring social media platforms to block accounts for users under 16.

items.title: US Tech Stocks Rally Led by Oracle, Nvidia, and Tesla
items.summary: Technology stocks drove gains in US markets with the S&P 500, Dow Jones, and Nasdaq 100 all closing higher amid easing concerns over valuations and expectations of potential rate cuts in 2026. Oracle extended its rebound while Nvidia and Tesla also advanced.

items.title: Cursor Acquires Code Review Startup Graphite
items.summary: Cursor has acquired Graphite, a code review startup, as competition in coding tools intensifies. The deal highlights ongoing consolidation in developer productivity software.

items.title: ZeroAvia Secures $150M Series D for Zero-Emission Aviation
items.summary: ZeroAvia raised $150 million in Series D funding to advance zero-emission commercial flight technology. The investment supports development of hydrogen-electric propulsion systems.

items.title: Erebor Bank Raises $350M for Crypto-Native Banking Infrastructure
items.summary: Erebor Bank secured $350 million in funding to build crypto-native banking infrastructure. The round targets expansion of blockchain-based financial services.
